attributes.action: Urge the BBC to save the Asian Network, Six Music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC should do the things that the commercial sector cannot do or cannot do well.

Six Music and the Asian Network are important stations that (like Radio 3) could not survive in the commercial sector.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
